channel.title: Website on Habib's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Habib's Site

item.title: Namecheap Domain to GitHub
item.description: GitHub provides you the chance to host your website via username.github.io domain. But if you have a custom domain then you can also configure that with GitHub. Today, I’m about to show you how you can add your Namecheap domain to GitHub. If you have not any Namecheap domain then you certainly can have for free like I got. Just apply to GitHub student dev pack and grab one. Okay, first thing first.
